short_summary: This procurement is open to all qualified suppliers and is of unlimited quantities. Suppliers are expected to respond to this Request for Proposal through an electronic response. This is a bilingual service.
description: The objective of the training is to provide individual second language training to INFC learners who need to obtain/ maintain the minimum official language proficiency requirement of their positions and, to provide part time group language training to learners who are obliged to maintain or improve their linguistic profiles as a requirement of their work position. This is a Request for Proposal for language training services in both English and French. The contract period will be for one (1) year from the date of contract with an irrevocable option to extend it for up to four (4) additional one-year periods.

## Language Training Services for Infrastructure Canada

### Tender Information

* **Tender ID**: cb-7294-8805640
* **Tender Title**: Language Training services for Infrastructure Canada
* **Language(s)**: English and French
* **Procurement Category**: Service
* **Trade Agreements**: The contracting authority has reserved the right to apply the following trade agreements:
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (CColFTA)
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement (CHFTA)
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (CPanFTA)
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
	+ Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
	+ Canada-United Kingdom Trade Continuity Agreement (C-UKTCA)
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP)

### Contract Requirements

* **Contract Duration**: The contract will have a one-year duration, with an option to extend it by up to four years.
* **Contracting Authority**: Jennifer Hendrick, procurement-approvisionnement@infc.gc.ca
* **Security Clearance**: A Designated Organization Screening (DOS) and Reliability Clearance are required for this tender

### Tendering Procedure

* **Tendering Method**: Open Tendering
* **Publication Date**: 2023-07-17
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-09-06, 10:00 AM EDT

### Description of Work

The objective of the training is to provide individual second language training to Infrastructure Canada learners, and to provide part-time group language training to staff members who require it for their job positions. The contracting authority will be issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) to provide these services.
